verses.text: Now there was a \w certain|strong="H0259"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \w Ramathaim-zophim|strong="H7436"\w*, of \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*, and his \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \add was\add* \w Elkanah|strong="H0511"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jeroham|strong="H3395"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Elihu|strong="H0453"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Tohu|strong="H8459"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zuph|strong="H6689"\w*, an \w Ephrathite|strong="H0673"\w*:

And he had \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w wives|strong="H0802"\w*; the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \add was\add* \w Hannah|strong="H2584"\w*, and the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the \w other|strong="H8145"\w* \w Peninnah|strong="H6444"\w*: and \w Peninnah|strong="H6444"\w* had \w children|strong="H3206"\w*, but \w Hannah|strong="H2584"\w* had no \w children|strong="H3206"\w*.

And \w this|strong="H1931"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* out of his \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w yearly|strong="H3117"\w* to \w worship|strong="H7812"\w* and to \w sacrifice|strong="H2076"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w* in \w Shiloh|strong="H7887"\w*. And the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Eli|strong="H5941"\w*, \w Hophni|strong="H2652"\w* and \w Phinehas|strong="H6372"\w*, the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, \add were\add* there.  +  r 1.3  t yearly: Heb. from year to year *

¶ And when the \w time|strong="H3117"\w* was that \w Elkanah|strong="H0511"\w* \w offered|strong="H2076"\w*, he \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* to \w Peninnah|strong="H6444"\w* his \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*, and to all her \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* and her \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*, \w portions|strong="H4490"\w*:

But unto \w Hannah|strong="H2584"\w* he \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H0259"\w* \w worthy|strong="H0639"\w* \w portion|strong="H4490"\w*; for he \w loved|strong="H0157"\w* \w Hannah|strong="H2584"\w*: but the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* had shut \w up|strong="H5462"\w* her \w womb|strong="H7358"\w*.\f + \fr 1.5 \ft worthy: or, double\f*

And her \w adversary|strong="H6869"\w* also \w provoked|strong="H3707"\w* her \w sore|strong="H3708"\w*, for to make her \w fret|strong="H7481"\w*, because the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* had \w shut|strong="H5462"\w* \w up|strong="H1157"\w* her \w womb|strong="H7358"\w*.\f + \fr 1.6 \ft provoked: Heb. angered\f*

And \add as\add* he \w did|strong="H6213"\w* so \w year|strong="H8141"\w* by \w year|strong="H8141"\w*, \w when|strong="H1767"\w* she went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, so she \w provoked|strong="H3707"\w* her; therefore she \w wept|strong="H1058"\w*, and did not \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*.\f + \fr 1.7 \ft when…: or, from the time that she, etc: Heb. from her going up\f*

Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w Elkanah|strong="H0511"\w* her \w husband|strong="H0376"\w* to her, \w Hannah|strong="H2584"\w*, why \w weepest|strong="H1058"\w* thou? and why \w eatest|strong="H0398"\w* thou not? and why is thy \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* \w grieved|strong="H3415"\w*? \add am\add* not I \w better|strong="H2896"\w* to thee than \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*?

¶ So \w Hannah|strong="H2584"\w* rose \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* they had \w eaten|strong="H0398"\w* in \w Shiloh|strong="H7887"\w*, and \w after|strong="H0310"\w* they had \w drunk|strong="H8354"\w*. Now \w Eli|strong="H5941"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* upon a \w seat|strong="H3678"\w* by a \w post|strong="H4201"\w* of the \w temple|strong="H1964"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

And she \add was\add* in \w bitterness|strong="H4751"\w* of \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*, and \w prayed|strong="H6419"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and \w wept|strong="H1058"\w* \w sore|strong="H1058"\w*.\f + \fr 1.10 \ft in…: Heb. bitter of soul\f*

And she \w vowed|strong="H5087"\w* a \w vow|strong="H5088"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, O 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, if thou wilt \w indeed|strong="H7200"\w* \w look|strong="H7200"\w* on the \w affliction|strong="H6040"\w* of thine \w handmaid|strong="H0519"\w*, and \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* me, and not \w forget|strong="H7911"\w* thine \w handmaid|strong="H0519"\w*, but wilt \w give|strong="H5414"\w* unto thine \w handmaid|strong="H0519"\w* a \w man|strong="H0582"\w* \w child|strong="H2233"\w*, then I will \w give|strong="H5414"\w* him unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* all the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of his \w life|strong="H2416"\w*, and there shall no \w razor|strong="H4177"\w* \w come|strong="H5927"\w* upon his \w head|strong="H7218"\w*.  +  r 1.11  t a man…: Heb. seed of men *

And it came to pass, as she \w continued|strong="H7235"\w* \w praying|strong="H6419"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, that \w Eli|strong="H5941"\w* \w marked|strong="H8104"\w* her \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*.\f + \fr 1.12 \ft continued…: Heb. multiplied to pray\f*

Now \w Hannah|strong="H2584"\w*, she \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* in her \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*; only her \w lips|strong="H8193"\w* \w moved|strong="H5128"\w*, but her \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* was not \w heard|strong="H8085"\w*: therefore \w Eli|strong="H5941"\w* \w thought|strong="H2803"\w* she had been \w drunken|strong="H7910"\w*.
And \w Eli|strong="H5941"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto her, How long wilt thou be \w drunken|strong="H7937"\w*? put \w away|strong="H5493"\w* thy \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* from thee.

And \w Hannah|strong="H2584"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, No, my \w lord|strong="H0113"\w*, I \add am\add* a \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* of a \w sorrowful|strong="H7186"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w*: I have \w drunk|strong="H8354"\w* neither \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* nor strong \w drink|strong="H7941"\w*, but have poured \w out|strong="H8210"\w* my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 1.15 \ft of a sorrowful…: Heb. hard of spirit\f*

\w Count|strong="H5414"\w* not thine \w handmaid|strong="H0519"\w* \w for|strong="H6440"\w* a \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Belial|strong="H1100"\w*: for out of the \w abundance|strong="H7230"\w* of my \w complaint|strong="H7879"\w* and \w grief|strong="H3708"\w* have I \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* hitherto.\f + \fr 1.16 \ft complaint: or, meditation\f*

Then \w Eli|strong="H5941"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Go|strong="H3212"\w* in \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*: and the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w grant|strong="H5414"\w* \add thee\add* thy \w petition|strong="H7596"\w* that thou hast \w asked|strong="H7592"\w* of him.

And she \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Let thine \w handmaid|strong="H8198"\w* \w find|strong="H4672"\w* \w grace|strong="H2580"\w* in thy \w sight|strong="H5869"\w*. So the \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* her \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, and did \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*, and her \w countenance|strong="H6440"\w* was no more \add sad\add*.

¶ And they rose \w up|strong="H7925"\w* in the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* \w early|strong="H7925"\w*, and \w worshipped|strong="H7812"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and \w returned|strong="H7725"\w*, and \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to their \w house|strong="H1004"\w* to \w Ramah|strong="H7414"\w*: and \w Elkanah|strong="H0511"\w* \w knew|strong="H3045"\w* \w Hannah|strong="H2584"\w* his \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*; and the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w remembered|strong="H2142"\w* her.

Wherefore it came to pass, when the \w time|strong="H3117"\w* was \w come|strong="H8622"\w* about after \w Hannah|strong="H2584"\w* had \w conceived|strong="H2029"\w*, that she \w bare|strong="H3205"\w* a \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, and \w called|strong="H7121"\w* his \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w*, \add saying\add*, Because I have \w asked|strong="H7592"\w* him of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 1.20 \ft when…: Heb. in revolution of days\f*\f + \fr 1.20 \ft Samuel: that is, Asked of God\f*

And the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w Elkanah|strong="H0511"\w*, and all his \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to \w offer|strong="H2076"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* the \w yearly|strong="H3117"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w*, and his \w vow|strong="H5088"\w*.

But \w Hannah|strong="H2584"\w* went not \w up|strong="H5927"\w*; for she \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto her \w husband|strong="H0376"\w*, \add I will not go up\add* until the \w child|strong="H5288"\w* be \w weaned|strong="H1580"\w*, and \add then\add* I will \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* him, that he may \w appear|strong="H7200"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and there \w abide|strong="H3427"\w* \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.

And \w Elkanah|strong="H0511"\w* her \w husband|strong="H0376"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto her, \w Do|strong="H6213"\w* what \w seemeth|strong="H5869"\w* thee \w good|strong="H2896"\w*; \w tarry|strong="H3427"\w* until thou have \w weaned|strong="H1580"\w* him; only the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w establish|strong="H6965"\w* his \w word|strong="H1697"\w*. So the \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* \w abode|strong="H3427"\w*, and gave her \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w suck|strong="H3243"\w* until she \w weaned|strong="H1580"\w* him.

¶ And when she had \w weaned|strong="H1580"\w* him, she took him \w up|strong="H5927"\w* with her, with \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w bullocks|strong="H6499"\w*, and \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w ephah|strong="H0374"\w* of \w flour|strong="H7058"\w*, and a \w bottle|strong="H5035"\w* of \w wine|strong="H3196"\w*, and \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* him unto the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* in \w Shiloh|strong="H7887"\w*: and the \w child|strong="H5288"\w* \add was\add* \w young|strong="H5288"\w*.
And they \w slew|strong="H7819"\w* a \w bullock|strong="H6499"\w*, and \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* the \w child|strong="H5288"\w* to \w Eli|strong="H5941"\w*.

And she \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Oh|strong="H0994"\w* my \w lord|strong="H0113"\w*, \add as\add* thy \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w liveth|strong="H2416"\w*, my \w lord|strong="H0113"\w*, I \add am\add* the \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* that \w stood|strong="H5324"\w* by thee here, \w praying|strong="H6419"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

For this \w child|strong="H5288"\w* I \w prayed|strong="H6419"\w*; and the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w given|strong="H5414"\w* me my \w petition|strong="H7596"\w* which I \w asked|strong="H7592"\w* of him:

Therefore also I have \w lent|strong="H7592"\w* him to the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; as long as he \w liveth|strong="H3117"\w* he shall be \w lent|strong="H7592"\w* to the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*. And he \w worshipped|strong="H7812"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* there.  +  r 1.28  t lent him: or, returned him, whom I have obtained by petition *  +  r 1.28  t he shall…: or, he whom I have obtained by petition shall be returned *
